column5: Here all week thru Saturday... not sure what Thursday vistors/times look like yet for us to skip out.
Anyone need any typography/proofreading services, I come cheap at $55 per hour! my lawn needs help!
Let "us" know when you can.  Maybe the other guy can get the bill too...

Does anyone here pay to get your yard work done?  A guy across the st. from me lives in the USA and has a home here for the summer.  In the winter I took care of the snow removel for him (at a fee).  Now he's asking me for a rate to cut the grass and do the edging for the whole season.  The lot's 40' x 110' and I would say the home is around 2500 SQ feet.  Thoughts on what I should charge?  I sure hope he's not asking me to weed it cause it's bad...

In-laws pay 200 a month and it gets cut as often as needed, which is sometimes once a week and sometimes twice if is growing like crazy. Yes from a prof. compay in the GTA and not some neighbors kid. ( that would be better but there is none around). Thier lot is 50 by 220.
Sounds like it would be a half hour work once a week. Assuming its just cutting and edging I say 20$ a week is fair.
depends do you really want to do it is it cut into your time ......anyway i would say 200.00 a month at your descretion for cutting and you will do the whole shot

A lot like that is $40 bucks a cut, edging and garden weeding included(once a month).  $160 a month.  I am still in the Landscape biz but more silently now.  Let me know if you are looking to sub this out, we have a property maintenance crew.
thank you very much!

Geoff, If you're interested in contracting this out, I could do it for about $780 per cut and you're good for 12% share. Cold hard cash. I also do daycare for $600/hr (per child BTW) and would be willing to kick back maybe 21% to your wife. I don't have any landscaping or daycare experience just yet but I'm thinking I could combine the two and learn 'on the job'. Can the little brats kids drive a lawn tractor?? Let me know, I'm just getting into this kind of stuff and looking for my first gigaroo.  Slayer
I've seen your garden and something tells me you spent some time there recently...
Post of the Day...by far!   :rofl2:

In are subdivision, the works go from $280-$320 a month. Includes: turning beds, pruning, fertilizing, trimming, cutting, blowing, bagging and disposal. If your doing all that, $20 a week is nothing, factor in  Gas, time and wear and tear.

$50 bucks a cut.... bottom line.  Thats roughly $1500 for the season ! Cutting and Trimming...... "Lawn Maintenance"  I deal with commercial cutters all the time. I have 3 that I look after myself ( Sell them Equipment )  $50 a cut seems to be the norm in my area
You my friend, are a very special person.
man im gonna get in the lawn cutting business.........lots of money there

Well I can tell you that $600/hr is way to cheap just post here and let us know how your making out after 2 hours and again after 8 hours and then at 9 hours when the parents say were running late but will be right there. I would take nothing less then $1200 per booger picker.  Yes I have experience with wife runs a home daycare and I give her all the props in the world anything more I say will incriminate me  And yes I give this post of the month vote also
It all depends on how much YOU want to do this job....not very interested...then $50 or more per cutting....need the money....make the price attractive to the customer...
I'll tell you what....how hot is the daycare girl...I might need some care from time to time...LOL...

True.  So I told him $800 for the season of just cutting.  He's going to call me again tomorrow.  If he want's more then just the cutting my price goes up as I hate cutting the grass but I can use the extra $ for a few new fishing toys (like a much needed new rain suit).
It's my wife who run's our home daycare so HOT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  And the answer is NOPE!
Damn....AGAIN....  ...LOL
This thread is useless without pics!
I have some but Geoff would get real mad if I shared them!!
I have been waiting for you to post some comment here...  PS, I would be banned and the 'kids' on the site would be PM'ing me for info if I posted anything good...
LOL Geoff.. I gots ta keep me self entertained somehow this week, while sitting in the 11th floor lounge!
You there Thursday? I have a 1:30 tomorrow...
